GSD.description:
media: ir_toy: free before error exiting

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 93ef3fdf3b6633c58f049e5a6be755777dde4340. For more details please see the references link.
